_meanings:
{@--2@}
[{#vas-Ric-lyuw#}] Preliminary 
consecration ({#pratizWA#}) of an image, its 
invocation and worship by suitable 
Mantras &c. before the commencement of
a sacrifice; ({#yajYAraMBAtprAk devatAdyAvAhanapUrvakaH#}
{#pUjanAdikarmaBedaH#}); making a divinity
assume its abode in an image.
